snippet: Lowcountry's Southern menus takes a focus on bourbon to extremes.
abstract: Lowcountry's Southern menus takes a focus on bourbon to extremes.
lead_paragraph: With the arrival of its new executive chef, Oliver Gift, Lowcountry, the West Village restaurant specializing in the comfort food of the American South, has revamped its food and cocktail menus.

headline.main: Bourbon All the Way at Lowcountry
